title: Calories in Ono Hawaiian BBQ Plate
meta_description: Discover calories in ono hawaiian bbq plate lunches, including macros, sodium, and tweaks for popular items like grilled chicken or katsu.
h1: Calories in Ono Hawaiian BBQ Plate
assumptions: Standard plate lunch with grilled chicken (8 oz), 2 scoops white rice, 1 scoop macaroni salad; no sides or drinks.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, portion size, preparation, and customizations. Check Ono Hawaiian BBQ menu or app for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard Ono Hawaiian BBQ grilled chicken plate has about 1100 kcal, with high sodium from sauces and sides.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to chicken katsu (breaded and fried)
Brown rice instead of white (per scoop)

faqs.q: How many calories in ono hawaiian bbq grilled chicken plate?
faqs.a: Approximately 1100 kcal for a standard plate with rice and mac salad.

faqs.q: What is the sodium in ono hawaiian bbq meals?
faqs.a: Often over 2000 mg per plate due to marinades, sauces, and sides.

faqs.q: Calories in ono hawaiian bbq katsu plate?
faqs.a: Around 1300 kcal, higher due to breading and frying.

faqs.q: Are ono hawaiian bbq plates high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, mainly from rice and mac saladâ€”about 140 g carbs per plate.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in ono hawaiian bbq order?
faqs.a: Opt for grilled proteins, skip mac salad, or choose smaller portions.
